SpeechGrammar.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The SpeechGrammar interface of the Web Speech API represents a set of words or patterns of words for the recognition service to recognize.

remarks.para: Grammar is defined using JSpeech Grammar Format (JSGF).

blockquote.para: The concept of grammar has been removed from the Web Speech API. Related features remain in the specification and are still recognized by supporting browsers for backwards compatibility, but they have no effect on speech recognition services.

SpeechGrammarSpeechGrammar.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The SpeechGrammar() constructor of the
interface creates a new SpeechGrammar object
instance.

SpeechGrammarSrc.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The src property of the interface
is used to get or set a string that contains the grammar within the SpeechGrammar object.

SpeechGrammarWeight.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The optional weight property of the
interface sets and returns the weight of the
SpeechGrammar object.
SpeechGrammarWeight.value: A float representing the weight of the grammar, in the range 0.0â€“1.0.
